meanings.sent1: The fruitings in the orchard brought joy to the farmers.
meanings.sent2: The fruitings of the apple tree were ripe and ready for picking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel enjoyed stealing the fruitings from the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work in the garden finally led to the sweet fruitings of her labor.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fruitings on the branches painted a beautiful picture in the garden.

meanings.definition: The result or product of a process.
meanings.sent1: After months of care, the plant proudly displayed its fruitings.
meanings.sent2: The chef proudly presented the delicious fruitings of his culinary skills.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected fruitings of their experiment surprised everyone in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The fruitings of their collaboration were evident in the successful project.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the bakery's fruitings filled the entire street.

meanings.sent1: The fruitings of the tree began after the blossoms fell.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully monitored the fruitings of the plants in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent3: The fruitings of her hard work were evident in the bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The fruitings of spring brought new life to the barren land.
meanings.sent5: The fruitings of the vineyard signaled a successful growing season.
